description.value:
The ghost creates an illusory double of a creature. The fetch functions as a 2nd-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Illusory Creature], except that the ghost doesn't control the fetch, and the spell lasts for [[/r 1d4 #hours]]{1d4 hours} instead of needing to Sustain the Spell.

The fetch has a rudimentary intelligence and tries to imitate its original (it has a Deception skill value equal to the ghost's highest skill) but comes across as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Confused] or vague.

A ghost can have only one fetch at a time. If the creature doubled by the fetch encounters it, the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2} on a critical failure) for as long as they can see the fetch.
